name: Pivot (mikeud15)
description:
Demo 

A pixel puzzle game inspired by Fez, made for a university project. Hoping to continue to work on it and further develop the project.

Explore and escape the world you exist in, face hazards and discover new paths to explore.

Keyboard Controls :

  • Use right and left keys to move.
  • Use Spacebar key to jump.
  • Use I key to interact with items and doors.
  • Use Return Key to continue with reading  notes.
  • Use Q and E to rotate world.

Keyboard Controls :

  • Use left analog stick to move. 
  • Press A button to jump.
  • Press Y button interact with items and doors.
  • Press B button to continue with reading  notes.
  • Use LB and RB to rotate world.
